info.institution: UCL's Gatsby Computational Neuroscience Unit in London
info.summary:
Hilbert J. Kappen works as a honorary faculty in UCL's Gatsby Computational Neuroscience Unit in London, and his\her h-index is 35, g-index is 63. His\Her interests are :
 Graphical Model; Boltzmann Machine; Belief Propagation; Mean Field; Medical Diagnosis;
